summary: A basic pack of 5 new followers
descriptionHtml:
The BRODST has called in reinforcements! Gather up 5 more members of the BRODST in the second official follower pack:

The Baker of Solitude; This infamous murder from Solitude is known for Taking his victims and burning them alive in his oven, and he seems to have his eye on you. The Baker has been known to visit his victims in their tombs...

Sahqo; This mysterious dragon hunter has built a reputation for taking down the dovah with ease, thus they have given him the nickname Sahqo (red in our language) He can be found blending in with the red-clad guards in Solitude

Jarl Damon of Cardboardbox; This Necromancer has been debating with all the Jarl Siddgeir of Falkreath to finally allow him to claim the island of Cardboardbox as its own reach and giving him the title of Jarl.

Targuus the Czykstan; This arena fighter is one of the best shield-based fighters in all of Tamriel, and he has recently been seen in Skyrim to see an old friend get married.

There is one more follower in Skyrim, but he is lost and needs help. If you can find this old friend he will prove a valuable ally.

This mod has no requirements other than vanilla Skyrim, but is made WAY better with Ultimate Follower Mod.
author: OfficailBRODST
